name: Human Farm - Practice Section
description:
■Story

The game takes place in a world where public human farms are established.
With the goal of becoming a "milking worker",
you head to the farm where you are doing your internship.
However, an emergency occurs during the visit?!!


■ Key Point!

This is a game that focuses on milking the "big boob" If you are a fan of big boob or enjoy milking, you definitely shouldn't miss this game.
Suspension milking, compression, outdoor, estrus, etc, various types of sex wait for you!
Come and have fun with the lewd depraved cow girl "Ayana" and sex with her in various places!

■ Ayana

The cow sister encountered inside the facility!
Although she is a bit silly, she tries to interact with the main character as a big sister.
Originally, it was only intended to practice milking with you...!?
If you successfully make her fall, you can even take her away to go with you!


■ Features

  • non-battle, pure exploration RPG!
    Where does the "M-Drugs", which could let the woman fall rapidly and make numerous milk, come from?
    All the mysteries await you to explore.
  • 14 basic CGs, 15 sex scenes!
  • Longer sex scenes and diverse facial expressions!
  • Suspension, compression, outdoor, estrus, etc, various types of sex!
